# ChangeLog

* Scope upgrade
* Vulnerability fix, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3302
## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

* Remove unused dependencies

## v0.1.9
* Performance optimizations.

## v0.1.8
* Performance: disabled log4js logs as we already doing loggin via pm2

## v0.1.7
